citeinfo.title: Global and Hemispheric Air Temperature Anomalies

descript.abstract:
Measurement Details global and hemispheric air temperature anomalies. Gridded values. Anomalies are relative to a 1951-1980 reference period.
Publication Wilson, H and J. Hansen. 1994. Global and hemispheric anomalies from instrumental surface air temperature records. pp. 609-614. In Boden, T.A., D.P. Kaiser, R.J. Sepanski, and F.W. Stoss (eds.). 1994. Trends'93: A Compendium of Data on Global Change. ORNL/CDIAC-65. Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center, Oak Ridge National Laboratory, Oak Ridge, Tennessee.
CDIAC
